items.question: What is included in the boilerplate?
items.answer: The boilerplate includes authentication (email, magic link, OAuth), Stripe payments integration, user dashboard, account management, multi-language support, and a production-ready database setup with Supabase.

items.question: Do I need to know TypeScript?
items.answer: Yes, the boilerplate is built with TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience. Basic TypeScript knowledge is recommended.

items.question: Can I use this for commercial projects?
items.answer: Yes, you can use this boilerplate for any personal or commercial project. There are no restrictions on usage.

items.question: Is there a free tier?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free tier that includes all core features. You can upgrade anytime to access premium features and higher limits.

items.question: How do I get support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team via email or through our GitHub repository. We typically respond within 24-48 hours.
